subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|ic}} - a person who holds a stick ([[卜#Chinese|卜]]) with his hand ([[又#Chinese|又]]), about to beat the head ([[元#Chinese|元]]) of another person, under the other persons own roof ([[宀#Chinese|宀]]). In Oracle bone script, two hands are holding the stick. In modern form, 卜 and 又 have merged into one character ([[攴#Chinese|攴]]), and is partially surrounded by 元.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|寇亂|寇仇|寇黨|寇劫|寇掠|寇攘|寇敌|寇機|寇準|寇熱|寇盗|寇脱|寇警|寇賊|寇鈔|寇雉|寇雠|倭寇|司寇|流寇|窮寇|草寇}}
